resources.string: It usually takes 45 minutes to reach Ratti Gali from Base Camp. There are comfortable arrangements for night stay at base camp. You can easily go towards lake by yourself or rent horse from locals. You have to rent jeep in order to reach base camp. No chance of inconvenience at any point!
Ratti Gali Lake, Dowarian, Jammu and Kashmir

It usually takes 45 minutes to reach Ratti Gali from Base Camp. There are comfortable arrangements for night stay at base camp. You can easily go towards lake by yourself or rent horse from locals. You have to rent jeep in order to reach base camp. No chance of inconvenience at any point!
the best thing about Pir Chinasi is, it\'s so near to Muzaffarabad and Road is in Good Condition, so anyone can reach…
Pir Chinasi، Muzaffarabad, Azad Jammu and Kashmir

Dream Valley Resort is located in the beautiful valley of Rawalakot, Azad Kashmir. The Dream Valley Resort is about 128KMs away from the Capital City of Islamabad, Pakistan. It offers extremely enchanting and natural beauty with lots of amenities like Kids Play Land, Restaurent, Huts, Tourist Rooms and Water Park. It\'s where the real family fun begins!

This place is located on main road from Rawalakot to Trar Khel. good place to visit with a small canal and good view of natural beauty
Public Works Department Rest House Rd, Banjosa, Azad Jammu and Kashmir
This place is located on main road from Rawalakot to Trar Khel. good place to visit with a small canal and good view of natural beauty

Nergola Waterfall is loacated in Rawalakot at a distance of 120 km from Rawalpindi. it takes t around three hours dirve from rawalpindi.the road is little bumpy but it will refresh you when you will get here. its location is just outside Rawalakot city in a place called mutialmera. There is a guest house located just across the street when you reach Nargola Waterfall.

Nergola Waterfall is loacated in Rawalakot at a distance of 120 km from Rawalpindi. it takes t around three hours dirve from rawalpindi.the road is little bumpy but it will refresh you when you will get here. its location is just outside Rawalakot city in a place called mutialmera. There is a guest house located just across the street when you reach Nargola Waterfall.

If you are visiting Azad Kashmir, you must visit upper Neelum valley situated Alongside Neelum river. Places like Kutton, Sharda and Kel/Arangkel must be seen. If you like adventure and natural beauty at its best, then go far Taobat, a true heaven on earth. But be warned that roads are in pretty bad shape so hire a local jeep.

It was a nice peaceful place, people were coming from all over. Just keep in mind like on all darbars on this one as well you are supposed to ask from God, not the person resting and pray for the person resting there as well.
Muzaffarabad, 7 خاص دربار, Darbaar Main St, Khari Sharif, Azad Jammu and Kashmir

It was a nice peaceful place, people were coming from all over. Just keep in mind like on all darbars on this one as well you are supposed to ask from God, not the person resting and pray for the person resting there as well.

Arang kel is one of the most beautiful meadows in Kashmir . from Kel u have two options - take an army monitored chair lift or trek for 3-4 hours . Chair lift cost us 100 pkr per person for a return ride .
Neelum Valley Road, Arang Kel, Azad Jammu and Kashmir 13231

Arang kel is one of the most beautiful meadows in Kashmir . from Kel u have two options – take an army monitored chair lift or trek for 3–4 hours . Chair lift cost us 100 pkr per person for a return ride .

Kashmir.which is also called paradise on earth has something to offer all time in a year .Neelym valley which is almost 100 kms from Muzaffarabad city is most beautiful place in azad kashmir ,Pakistan.In winter there is snowy mountains which present beatiful scenery .In summer it has amazing weather.If you get a chance visit this place you will remember it forever

Tolipeer is situated inAzadJammu kashmir Pakistan.A famous and beautiful resort . On Top of hill it has amazing view.
Toli Pir Rd, Toli Pir, Shaheed Gala, Rawalakot, Azad Jammu and Kashmir 12350

This is a great park and as the name suggests it is for families to go and enjoy, kids will love the riders while the adults can enjoy the lovely scenery ( and rides). from quads and pirate ship to zip line and Ferris wheel there is something for all. oh and you have to check out the virtual reality motion rides its a must!!!

This is a great park and as the name suggests it is for families to go and enjoy, kids will love the riders while the adults can enjoy the lovely scenery ( and rides). from quads and pirate ship to zip line and Ferris wheel there is something for all. oh and you have to check out the virtual reality motion rides its a must!!!

It is a bridge connecting Azad Kashmir to Murree. The name of the place is Kohala and so the name of bridge is kohala bridge. Under the bridge is a river Neelam. There are spots n restaurants under the bridge where one can sit either at the edge of the river or even inside the waters on the bank of river. The best food to try here is the white trout fish. Also one can relax, take pictures in water. The place is surrounded by mountains and clouds on top makes it more beautiful and magical.

It is a bridge connecting Azad Kashmir to Murree. The name of the place is Kohala and so the name of bridge is kohala bridge. Under the bridge is a river Neelam. There are spots n restaurants under the bridge where one can sit either at the edge of the river or even inside the waters on the bank of river. The best food to try here is the white trout fish. Also one can relax, take pictures in water. The place is surrounded by mountains and clouds on top makes it more beautiful and magical.

As Mangla Dam has dried up it was possible to drive from New Mirpur down to the Old Mirpur site. My parents moved to the new city circa 1968 as Mangla Dam was being built. Was a moving experience to see the Old Hindu Temple, which stood above the main Bazaar where my father had a small shop.Bawali, according to my mother, was almost like a public bath where local men used to bathe and partake in gym type activities and wrestling.
5P2V+V4H, New Mirpur City, Azad Jammu and Kashmir

As Mangla Dam has dried up it was possible to drive from New Mirpur down to the Old Mirpur site. My parents moved to the new city circa 1968 as Mangla Dam was being built. Was a moving experience to see the Old Hindu Temple, which stood above the main Bazaar where my father had a small shop.Bawali, according to my mother, was almost like a public bath where local men used to bathe and partake in gym type activities and wrestling.
Its a nice place snakes and bathrooms are available at this place, Special point you can wash your car for free running water tapes. There are few shops of Biscuits, Pakoras, Tea Cofee.
CMFR+JCX, Dhani, Azad Jammu and Kashmir

Fort has magnificent views of Mangla Dam. It is under Pakistan Army control and boat ride is highly recommended to view the entire area. Good place for family outing .
